bg-settings.name: Background Settings
bg-settings.description: Configure settings related to custom backgrounds. These should be important for you to configure.

backgrounds.name: Backgrounds
backgrounds.description: Folder containing all of your PNG, GIF, JPG and WEBP image files for setting as your custom background. If you run into issues with your built-in File Manager on Android, Download and use RS File Manager from Google Play for selecting a folder.

manual-background.name: Manual Background
manual-background.description: Disable randomized backgrounds and lets you set whatever as your background. (Maybe try downloading a high quality Nyan Cat GIF from Google)

menu-settings.name: Menu Settings
menu-settings.description: Configure settings related to specific menus in Geometry Dash. We get you don't want to see random backgrounds you might not like in some menus.

show-icons.name: Show Icons
show-icons.description: Show the player icons in the main menu. (you do know those running player icons that show in the main menu, right?)

only-main-menu.name: Only Main Menu
only-main-menu.description: Show custom backgrounds in the main menu only. (selecting this option will officially make you the most boring person to use this mod)
